workflow.name: Create consulting client onboarding tasks with GPT-4o-mini, Google Sheets and Slack
workflow.description:
## Who this workflow is for
Consulting firms in strategy, management, or IT who want to automate client onboarding and internal task assignment.

## What this workflow does
Automatically creates onboarding tasks and checklists using AI, routes them to the right consultant, logs client info in Google Sheets, and sends client welcome emails. Internal teams get Slack notifications, and kickoff meetings can be scheduled automatically.

## How the workflow works
1. New client intake triggers workflow
2. AI generates onboarding checklist
3. Tasks routed based on project type
4. Client info logged in Google Sheets
5. Slack notifications sent to consultants
6. Optional PDF of onboarding sent to client
7. Email confirmation delivered to client
8. Optional CRM integration

## Setup Instructions
- Connect Webhook/Form for intake
- Connect Google Sheets
- Connect OpenAI
- Connect Slack and email
- Configure optional CRM integration

**Author:** Hyrum Hurst, AI Automation Engineer  
**Company:** QuarterSmart  
**Contact:** hyrum@quartersmart.com

workflow.name: Automated Client Onboarding and Task Assignment System

options.instructions:
You are an expert consultant onboarding assistant. Based on the client information and project type provided, generate:

1. A comprehensive onboarding checklist (5-8 items) tailored to the project type
2. First 3-5 actionable tasks to get started
3. Key deliverables and milestones

Format your response as JSON with the following structure:
{
  "checklist": ["item1", "item2", ...],
  "firstTasks": ["task1", "task2", ...],
  "deliverables": ["deliverable1", "deliverable2", ...]
}

Tailor recommendations based on project type:
- Strategy: Focus on analysis, planning, and strategic frameworks
- Management: Focus on process optimization, team coordination, and implementation
- IT: Focus on technical requirements, system architecture, and development phases

parameters.html:
=

Welcome, {{ $json.clientName }}! üéâ

Thank you for choosing our consulting services. We're excited to partner with you on your {{ $json.projectType }} project.

What's Next?

Your dedicated consultant has been assigned and will reach out shortly to schedule your kickoff meeting.

Your Onboarding Checklist:

    {{ $json.message.content ? JSON.parse($json.message.content).checklist.map(item => `
  • ${item}
    • `).join("") : "
  • Details will be shared in your kickoff meeting
    • " }}

First Tasks:

    {{ $json.message.content ? JSON.parse($json.message.content).firstTasks.map(item => `
  • ${item}
    • `).join("") : "
  • Details will be shared in your kickoff meeting
    • " }}

If you have any questions, feel free to reply to this email.

Best regards,
Your Consulting Team
parameters.subject: =Welcome to Our Consulting Services - {{ $json.clientName }}

additionalFields.description:
=Initial kickoff meeting for {{ $json.projectType }} project with {{ $json.clientName }} from {{ $json.company }}.

Agenda:
- Introductions
- Project overview
- Timeline and deliverables
- Next steps

parameters.content:
## Main
This workflow automates consulting client onboarding, task creation, and routing. AI generates a checklist based on project type and assigns tasks to the correct team member.

## Setup
1. Connect your Webhook/Form credentials for client intake.
2. Configure Google Sheets to store client info.
3. Connect OpenAI credentials for checklist/task generation.
4. Connect Slack for internal notifications.
5. Connect email for client communication.
6. Optional: CRM integration for automated logging.

**Author:** Hyrum Hurst, AI Automation Engineer
**Company:** QuarterSmart
**Contact:** hyrum@quartersmart.com

user.name: Hyrum Hurst
user.bio: Google Certified AI Automations Engineer, Agentic Workflow Specalist
